name: Tackle
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Quick Attack
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Take Down
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Razor Leaf
description: Sharp edged leaves are launched to slash at the opponent.

name: Vine Whip
description: A whip-like vine is used to lash the opponent. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Ember
description: The target is attacked with small flames.

name: Flamethrower
description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

name: Water Gun
description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

name: Thunder Shock
description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Psybeam
description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

name: Ice Beam
description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

name: Earthquake
description: The monster sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pmon around it.

name: Shadow Ball
description: The monster hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Def stat.

name: Hydro Pump
description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: Electric Surge
description: The monster releases a powerful electric surge that damages the target and lowers its speed.

name: Toxic Spray
description: The monster sprays a toxic substance on the target, which gradually poisons it.

name: Shadow Sneak
description: The monster sneaks up on the target from behind and strikes it with a shadowy force.

name: Aqua Tail
description: The monster attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Frost Breath
description: The monster exhales a freezing-cold breath that may freeze the target.

name: Grass Touch
description: The monster touches the target with its leafy arms and cuts it with sharp thorns.

name: Grass Punch
description: The target is punched with a leafy fist. It may also lower the target's defense.

name: Steel Kick
description: The monster kicks the target with a steel-hard foot.

name: Fair Wind
description: The monster summons a fair wind that damages the target and lowers its speed.

name: Thunderbolt
description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Fire Punch
description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Ice Punch
description: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.

name: Thunder Punch
description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Grass Cannon
description: The monster fires a grassy cannon at the target. It may also lower the target's defense.

name: Sludge
description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy sludge. It may also poison the target.

name: Shadow Punch
description: The target is punched with a fist wrapped in shadows. It may also lower the target's Attack stat.

name: Sludge Bomb
description: The target is hit with a bomb filled with a filthy sludge. It may also poison the target.

name: Mud-Slap
description: The target is hit with a sludge-filled attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Ice Beam
description: A beam of ice is launched at the target. It may also leave the target frozen.

name: Blizzard
description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the target. It may also leave the target frozen.

name: Hyper Beam
description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Poison Fang
description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may also poison the target.

name: Fire Blast
description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Waterfall
description: The target is hit with a giant wave of water crashing down from above.

name: Surf
description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave. It may also lower the targets' accuracy.

name: Fairy Yell
description: The user starts yelling at the target in a high-pitched voice. It may also lower the target's Attack stat.

name: Giant Claw
description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

name: Aqua Bomb
description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

name: Bite
description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs.

name: Crunch
description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Dragon Breath
description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of hot breath. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The target is slashed with huge, sharp claws. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Dragon Pulse
description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

name: Dragon Rush
description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Grass Claw
description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws. It may also lower the target's Attack stat.

name: Draco Meteor
description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Thunder Shock
description: The target is jolted with a jolt of electricity. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder
description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Punch
description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Wave
description: The target is hit by a weak jolt of electricity. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Twister
description: The target is attacked with a fierce whirlwind that may also make the defence stat fall.

name: Water Pulse
description: The target is attacked with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

name: Water Blast
description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure. It may also confuse the target.

name: Aerial Ace
description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Air Cutter
description: The target is sliced with a scythe-like wind. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Air Slash
description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target confused.

name: Ancient Power
description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise the user's defence stat.

name: Steel Fist
description: The user slams the target with a steel fist. It may also raise the user's defence stat.

name: Insect Bite
description: The user bites the target. It may also poison the target.

name: Earthy Fist
description: The user slams the target with a fist made of earth. It may also lower the target's defence stat.

name: Psycho Cut
description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. The target's may also become confused.

name: Scream of Pain
description: The user attacks the target with a horrible sound wave. It may also lower the target's defence stat. and confuse it.

name: Gold Rush
description: The user attacks the target with a flurry of gold coins.

name: Aqua Jet
description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

name: Aqua Fist
description: The user slams the target with a water fist. It may also lower the target's defence stat.

name: Astonish
description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target confused.

name: Psycho Blast
description: The user attacks the target with a powerful psychic blast. It may also make the target fall asleep.

name: Blizzard Blast
description: A blast of freezing cold air is blown at the target. It may also leave the target frozen.

name: Salt Blast
description: The user gets salty and blasts the target with salt. It may also leave the target confused.

name: Brick Break
description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Brine
description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

name: Bug Bite
description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Bug Buzz
description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vigorously shaking its body. It may also lower the target's special defence stat.

name: Candy Crush
description: The user crushes the target with a candy cane from Reuters Kiosk. It may also lower the target's defence stat.

name: Charge Beam
description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The target may be left with paralysis.

name: Clamp
description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell. It may increase the user's defence stat.

name: Comet Punch
description: The user throws a flurry of punches that strike the target.

name: Iron Shield
description: The user protects itself with a hard shell. It may also raise the user's defence stat.

name: Psycho Edge
description: The user attacks with a blade of psychic energy. The user may also confuse the target.

name: Insect Wave
description: The user attacks with a wave of insects. It may poison the target.

name: Confuse Ray
description: A sinister ray that induces confusion in the target.

name: Crabhammer
description: The user hits the target with a pincer attack.

name: Cross Chop
description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. It may also lower the target's defence stat.

name: Crunch Punch
description: The user throws a punch with the power to shatter a rock. It may also lower the target's defence stat.

name: Dark Pulse
description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target confused.

name: Dark Void
description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at the target. It may also make the target confused.

name: Defend Order
description: The user focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its defence stat.

name: Discharge
description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. It may also leave those it hits with paralysis.

name: Double Kick
description: The user delivers two kicks in a row. It may also lower the target's defence stat.

name: Fairy Ray
description: The user shoots a ray of light at the target. It may also lower the target's defence stat. and make it confused.

name: Double Slap
description: The user slaps the target with its open palm two to five times in a row.

name: Double Team
description: The user creates illusory copies of itself to confuse the target.

name: Draco Punch
description: The user gathers all its power and slams the target with its punch. It may also lower the target's defence stat.

name: Dragon Smash
description: The user slams the target with its tail. It may also lower the target's defence stat.

name: Dragon Dance
description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its attack and defense stats.

name: Fairy Spin
description: The user spins around and creates a whirlwind that hits the target. It may make the enemy fall asleep.

name: Wings of Chaos
description: The user flys around the target and hits it with its wings. It may lower the target's defence stat.

name: Meteor Smash
description: The user creates a meteor and smashes it into the target.

name: Tunnel Retreat
description: The user digs a hole and retreats into it. It may also increase the user's defence stat. and heal the user.
